channel.title: Character wont save
channel.description:
Hi,
I'm having another problem with my server.
I edited most of it, so everything works fine other than two things.
My character won't save when it logs out, but it is able to save when the server auto saves it. A message comes "could not save character<name goes here>"
The other things is I had an error while compiling, not sure if that changed anything, but it said that there was an impossible statement here.
the statement was if (item == 4708 && playerLevel [13] >=85. I'm using cheezscape update 80. Can anyone help me fix these two errors?

item.title: Character wont save
item.dc:creator: @vinayak vinayak
item.description:
@vinayak wrote:

It says the statement is unreachable, which should mean it’s impossible to happen.

I don’t know what the problem is.

Read full topic

item.title: Character wont save
item.dc:creator: @Shorty626 Shorty626
item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

How is that statement impossible?

Read full topic

item.title: Character wont save
item.dc:creator: @vinayak vinayak
item.description:
@vinayak wrote:

Hi,

I’m having another problem with my server.

I edited most of it, so everything works fine other than two things.

My character won’t save when it logs out, but it is able to save when the server auto saves it.
A message comes “could not save character”

The other things is I had an error while compiling, not sure if that changed anything, but it said that there was an impossible statement here.

the statement was if (item == 4708 && playerLevel [13] >=85.
I’m using cheezscape update 80.
Can anyone help me fix these two errors?

Read full topic
